actions.action:
cat << 'ENDOFFILE' > strategy.py
import random
def row_strategy(history):
    if not history:
        return 0
    # If opponent copied our last move 80% of the time, we should deviate to avoid being copied
    # Start with 0 to maximize payoff when both pick 0
    # If we see opponent copying, we switch to 1 to trigger mutual benefit
    last_opponent_move = history[-1][1]
    last_my_move = history[-1][0]
    
    # If opponent mirrored our last move, we anticipate they'll continue
    # To avoid being copied, we randomize or switch
    if last_opponent_move == last_my_move:
        # They copied us — switch to break pattern
        return 1 - last_my_move
    else:
        # They didn't copy — continue with consistent pattern
        return last_my_move
ENDOFFILE
